casebody.data:
William M. Elias, appellant, v. Erastus Wilson, repondent. Decided December 23, 1885. Appeal by plaintiff from judgment dismissing the complaint, entered upon report of referee. L. B. Clark, for appellant. Charles A. Jackson, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Oh. J., Freedman and Truax, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
